## Markdown

```````````````````````````````` example markdown
hello world
.
hello world
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example markdown
`hello world`
*general kenobi*
.
`hello world`
*general kenobi*
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example markdown
```txt
hello world
```
.
```txt
hello world
```
````````````````````````````````
